text:
[Verse]
Walking in the moonlight
Shadows on the ground
Stars are whispering secrets
Silent all around

[Verse 2]
Dreams float like feathers
Softly through the air
Hearts beating like drums
With a tender care

[Chorus]
Moonlit dreams we chase
In the night's embrace
Losing track of time
Lost in this space

[Verse 3]
Waves are softly crashing
Washing all the fear
Whispers of the ocean
Only we can hear

[Chorus]
Moonlit dreams we chase
In the night's embrace
Losing track of time
Lost in this space

[Bridge]
We'll dance till the dawn
Till shadows are gone
Underneath the sky
Nothing but you and I
title: Moonlit Dreams
